item.title: Version 1.2.7
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add customizable text sending method and window title rules

  • Add TextSendingMethod enum (chunked/oneByOne) to WindowTitleRule
  • Add WindowTitleRulesView for managing app-specific text injection settings
  • Update CharacterInjector to use configurable text sending method instead of hardcoded Safari check
  • Enhance AppBehaviorDetector with comprehensive app detection capabilities
  • Add customizable injection delays (backspace, wait, text) per window title rule
  • Improve debug logging for better visibility of injection behavior
  • Update SettingsView to integrate window title rules configuration
  • Update README with new features documentation
